00010 #include "jcom.hub.h"

00015 #define value value_list[0]

00017 struct _byName : binary_function<t_preset*, t_preset*, bool> {
00018         bool operator()(const t_preset* p, const t_preset* q)
00019                 {       return p->name == q->name; }
00020 } presetByName;
00021  
00022 struct _byNum : binary_function<t_preset*, long, bool> {
00023         bool operator()(const t_preset* p, const long q)
00024                 {       return p->number == q; }
00025 } presetByNumber;
00026 
00030 struct _presetIsLess : binary_function<t_preset*, t_preset*, bool> {
00031         bool operator()(const t_preset* p, const t_preset* q)
00032                 {       return p->number < q->number; }
00033 } presetIsLess;
00034 
00035 void hub_preset_copy(t_hub *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)  // number or name
00036 {
00037         presetList              *preset = x->preset;
00038         
00039         if(argc < 1){
00040                 error("jcom.hub (%s module): preset.recall requires a valid argument", x->attr_name);
00041                 return;
00042         }
00043         
00044         presetListIterator pIter;
00045         bool found = false;
00046         if(argv->a_type == A_SYM) {
00047                 for(pIter = preset->begin(); pIter != preset->end(); ++pIter) {
00048                         if((*pIter)->name == argv->a_w.w_sym) {
00049                                 found = true;
00050                                 break;
00051                         }
00052                 }
00053         } else {
00054                 long presetNum = atom_getlong(argv);
00055                 for(pIter = preset->begin(); pIter != preset->end(); ++pIter) {
00056                         if((*pIter)->number == presetNum) {
00057                                 found = true;
00058                                 break;
00059                         }
00060                 }                       
00061         }
00062         
00063         t_symbol* presetsName = NULL;
00064         if(found) {
00065                 t_preset *presetCopy = (t_preset*)sysmem_newptr((sizeof(t_preset)));
00066                 // Get name to use for the newly created preset
00067                 if(argc > 1) 
00068                         presetsName = atom_getsym(argv+1);
00069                 else 
00070                         presetsName = symbol_unique();  // make one up
00071 
00072                 critical_enter(0);
00073                 sysmem_copyptr(*pIter, presetCopy, sizeof(t_preset));
00074                 presetItemList  *item = (*pIter)->item;
00075                 presetCopy->number = preset->size() + 1;  // place copied preset at end of preset list
00076                 presetCopy->item = new presetItemList(*item);
00077                 presetCopy->name = presetsName;
00078                 preset->merge(presetCopy, presetIsLess);  // add to list of presets
00079                 critical_exit(0);
00080                 hub_preset_buildmenu(x);
00081         } else {
00082                 error("jcom.hub (%s module): preset to copy not found", x->attr_name);
00083         }
00084         
00085 }
00086                         
00087         
00088         
00089 void hub_preset_recall(t_hub *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)        // number or name
00090 {
00091         presetList              *preset = x->preset;
00092         presetItemList  *item;
00093         bool                    found = false;
00094         short                   num_items_with_priority = 0;
00095         short                   num_items_recalled = 0;
00096         short                   i;
00097         
00098         if(argc < 1){
00099                 error("jcom.hub (%s module): preset.recall requires a valid argument", x->attr_name);
00100                 return;
00101         }
00102 
00103         presetListIterator pIter;
00104         critical_enter(0);      
00105         // Search the linked list of presets for the specified preset by name
00106         if(argv->a_type == A_SYM){
00107                 for(pIter = preset->begin(); pIter != preset->end(); ++pIter) {
00108                         if((*pIter)->name == argv->a_w.w_sym) {
00109                                 found = true;
00110                                 break;
00111                         }
00112                         //pIter = preset->find_if(preset->begin(), preset->end(), presetByName);
00113                         //found = pIter != preset->end() ? true : false;
00114                 }
00115         }
00116         else{
00117                 long preset_num = atom_getlong(argv);
00118                 for(pIter = preset->begin(); pIter != preset->end(); ++pIter) {
00119                         if((*pIter)->number == preset_num) {
00120                                 found = true;
00121                                 break;
00122                         }
00123                         //pIter = preset->find_if(pIter, preset->end(), presetByNumber);
00124                         //found = pIter != preset->end() ? true : false;
00125                 }
00126         }
00127         
00128         if(!found){
00129                 if(x->attr_name != gensym("/editing_this_module"))
00130                         error("jcom.hub (%s module): preset.recall - invalid preset specified", x->attr_name->s_name);
00131                 critical_exit(0);
00132                 return;
00133         }
00134         
00135         // Store the number of the preset we recalled last in the first preset (the one being recalled now)
00136         (*(x->preset->begin()))->last_preset_num = (*pIter)->number;
00137         // Store the name as well
00138         (*(x->preset->begin()))->last_preset_name = (*pIter)->name;
00139         // Now take our preset items and send them out!
00140         item = (*pIter)->item;
00141         presetItemListIterator itemIterator;
00142         for(itemIterator = item->begin(); itemIterator != item->end(); ++itemIterator) {
00143                 if((*itemIterator)->priority)
00144                         num_items_with_priority++;
00145         }
00146 
00147         t_preset_item *presetItem;
00148         if(num_items_with_priority > 0){
00149                 i=1;
00150                 while(num_items_with_priority > num_items_recalled){
00151                         for(itemIterator = item->begin(); itemIterator != item->end(); ++itemIterator) {
00152                                 presetItem = *itemIterator;
00153                                 if(presetItem->priority == i) {
00154                                         hub_symbol(x, presetItem->param_name, presetItem->list_size,
00155                                                 &(presetItem->value_list[0]));
00156                                         num_items_recalled++;
00157                                 }
00158                         }
00159                         i++;
00160                 }
00161                 // Recall items with priority 0 now
00162                 for(itemIterator = item->begin(); itemIterator != item->end(); ++itemIterator) {
00163                         presetItem = *itemIterator;
00164                         if(presetItem->priority == 0)
00165                                 hub_symbol(x, presetItem->param_name, presetItem->list_size, &(presetItem->value_list[0]));
00166                 }               
00167         }
00168         else{
00169                 for(itemIterator = item->begin(); itemIterator != item->end(); ++itemIterator) {
00170                         presetItem = *itemIterator;
00171                         if(presetItem->priority == 0)
00172                                 hub_symbol(x, presetItem->param_name, presetItem->list_size, &(presetItem->value_list[0]));
00173                 }
00174         }
00175         critical_exit(0);
00176 }
00177 
00178 
00179 void hub_preset_store(t_hub *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)         // number & optional name
00180 {
00181         long                    preset_num = 0;
00182         t_symbol                *preset_name = NULL;
00183         presetList              *preset = x->preset;
00184         presetItemList  *item;
00185         t_preset_item   *newItem = NULL;
00186         subscriberList  *subscriber;            // used for traversing parameters to get their names and values
00187         t_atom                  *av;                                    // used for return values from attribute queries
00188         long                    ac;                                             // ...
00189         
00190         if(argc < 1){
00191                 // write over the last preset recalled
00192                         
00193                 if(preset->empty()) {
00194                         error("jcom.hub (%s module): no preset specified active", x->attr_name);
00195                         return;
00196                 }
00197                 // Recall the number of the preset we recalled last     
00198                 preset_num = (*(preset->begin()))->last_preset_num;
00199                 // Recall the name as well
00200                 preset_name = (*(preset->begin()))->last_preset_name;
00201         } else {
00202         
00203                 if(argv->a_type != A_LONG){
00204                         error("jcom.hub (%s module): first argument must be an int if a name is specified", x->attr_name);
00205                         return;
00206                 }
00207                 
00208                 preset_num = atom_getlong(argv);
00209                 if(argc > 1)
00210                         preset_name = atom_getsym(argv+1);
00211                 else
00212                         preset_name = symbol_unique();
00213         }
00214         
00215         // Search the linked list for this preset (if it already exists) and remove it
00216         //      also remove any items that are members of the preset
00217         presetListIterator pIter;
00218         presetItemListIterator itemIterator;
00219         t_preset* p;
00220         /*
00221         pIter = preset->begin();
00222         if(!preset->empty())
00223                 pIter = preset->find_if(preset->begin(), preset->end(), presetByNumber(*pIter, preset_num));
00224         if(pIter != preset->end()) {
00225         */
00226         for(pIter = preset->begin(); pIter != preset->end(); ++pIter) {
00227                 p = *pIter;
00228                 if(p->number == preset_num) {
00229                         item = p->item;
00230                         // Free the parameters this preset contains
00231                         for(itemIterator = item->begin(); itemIterator != item->end(); ++itemIterator) {
00232                                 sysmem_freeptr(*itemIterator);
00233                                 itemIterator = item->erase(itemIterator);
00234                         }
00235                         delete item;
00236                         // Free the preset itself
00237                         sysmem_freeptr(p);
00238                         // Remove from linked list
00239                         pIter = preset->erase(pIter);
00240                 }
00241         }
00242         
00243         
00244         // Allocate the slot for this preset, and store the data
00245         p = (t_preset *)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_preset));
00246         p->number = preset_num;
00247         p->name = preset_name;
00248         // Store the number of the preset we recalled last in the first preset (the one being recalled now)
00249         (*(x->preset->begin()))->last_preset_num = preset_num;
00250         // Store the name as well
00251         (*(x->preset->begin()))->last_preset_name = preset_name;
00252         /* XXX Probably also need to delete this in hub_free() when deleting a preset */
00253         p->item = new presetItemList;                   // start with no items in the preset
00254 
00255         // Allocate the items for this preset (by traversing all parameters)
00256         subscriber = x->subscriber;
00257         subscriberIterator i;
00258         t_subscriber* t;
00259         for(i = subscriber->begin(); i != subscriber->end(); ++i) {
00260                 t = *i;
00261                 if(t->type == ps_subscribe_parameter){
00262                         newItem = (t_preset_item *)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_preset_item));
00263                         newItem->param_name = t->name;
00264 
00265                         ac = NULL; av = NULL;                                                                                           // init
00266                         object_attr_getvalueof(t->object, ps_type, &ac, &av);           // get
00267                         newItem->type = atom_getsym(av);                                                                                // copy
00268 
00269                         ac = NULL; av = NULL;                                                                                           // init
00270                         object_attr_getvalueof(t->object, ps_priority, &ac, &av);       // get
00271                         newItem->priority = atom_getlong(av);                                                                   // copy
00272                         
00273                         ac = NULL; av = NULL;                                                                                           // init
00274                         object_attr_getvalueof(t->object, ps_value, &ac, &av);          // get
00275                         sysmem_copyptr(av, &newItem->value_list[0], sizeof(t_atom) * ac);
00276                         newItem->list_size = ac;
00277                         
00278                         p->item->push_back(newItem);
00279                 }
00280         }
00281         preset->merge(p, presetIsLess);
00282         critical_exit(0);       
00283         hub_preset_buildmenu(x);
00284 }
00285 
00286 void hub_preset_store_next(t_hub *x, t_symbol *msg, long argc, t_atom *argv)    
00287 {
00288         t_atom b[2];
00289         atom_setlong(&b[0], x->preset->size() + 1);
00290         atom_setsym(&b[1], atom_getsym(argv));
00291         hub_preset_store(x, gensym("/preset/store"), 2, b);
00292 }

00294 // read the default file and recall the first preset
00295 void hub_preset_default(t_hub *x)
00296 {
00297         char    default_file_name[256];
00298         t_atom  a;
00299         
00300         strcpy(default_file_name, x->attr_name->s_name);
00301         strcat(default_file_name, ".xml");
00302         
00303         atom_setlong(&a, 1);
00304 
00305         hub_preset_doread(x, gensym(default_file_name));
00306         hub_preset_recall(x, _sym_nothing, 1, &a);
00307 }

00311 
00312 void hub_preset_read(t_hub *x, t_symbol *userpath)
00313 {
00314         defer_low(x, (method)hub_preset_doread, userpath, 0, 0L);
00315 }
00316 
00317 
00318 void hub_preset_doread(t_hub *x, t_symbol *userpath)
00319 {
00320         char                    filename[256];                  // for storing the name of the file locally
00321         char                    fullpath[512];                  // path and name passed on to the xml parser
00322         short                   path;                                   // pathID#
00323         long                    outtype;                                // the file type that is actually true
00324 
00325         // FIND THE FILE WE WANT TO READ
00326         if(!userpath->s_name[0]){                                                                                                       // Empty string
00327                 if(open_dialog(filename, &path, &outtype ,NULL, -1))                    // Returns 0 if successful
00328                         return;                                                                                                         // User Cancelled
00329         }
00330         else{
00331                 strcpy(filename, userpath->s_name);                                                                     // Copy symbol argument to a local string
00332                 if(locatefile_extended(filename, &path, &outtype, NULL, -1)){   // Returns 0 if successful
00333                         if(x->attr_name != gensym("/editing_this_module"))
00334                                 error("jcom.hub (%s module): preset file not found", x->attr_name->s_name);
00335                         return;                                                                                                         // Not found
00336                 }       
00337         }
00338 
00339         jcom_core_getfilepath(path, filename, fullpath);
00340         //post("path for xml preset file: %s", temppath);
00341         hub_preset_parse(x, fullpath);
00342         hub_preset_buildmenu(x);
00343 }
00344 
00345 
00346 int coerceType(const char* s)
00347 {
00348         // Is the first char a digit?
00349         if(isdigit(s[0])){
00350                 // It's not a symbol, so is it an int or a float?
00351                 if(strchr(s, '.'))  // First char is a digit and s contains a ., consider it a float
00352                         return A_FLOAT;
00353                 else
00354                         return A_LONG;  // No decimal point, so treat it as an int
00355         }
00356         else if(s[0] == '-'){
00357                 if(strlen(s) > 1){
00358                         if(isdigit(s[1])){
00359                                 if(strchr(s, '.'))      // First char is a digit and s contains a ., consider it a float
00360                                         return A_FLOAT;
00361                                 else
00362                                         return A_LONG;          // No decimal point, so treat it as an int                              
00363                         }
00364                 }
00365         }
00366         return A_SYM; // Not a float, not an int, must be a symbol
00367 }
00368 
00369 
00370 // Actually read and parse the XML file for a preset
00371 void hub_preset_parse(t_hub *x, char *path)
00372 {
00373         xmlTextReaderPtr        reader = NULL;
00374         int                                     ret = 0;
00375         const xmlChar           *element_name = 0,
00376                                                 *name = 0, 
00377                                                 *number = 0, 
00378                                                 *val = 0;
00379         presetList                      *presetLL = x->preset;
00380         t_preset                        *preset = NULL;                 // the current preset we are parsing
00381         t_preset_item           *item = NULL;                   // the current preset item we are parsing
00382         const xmlChar           *type = 0;                              // data type of the current preset item
00383         const xmlChar           *priority = 0;
00384         int                             preset_num = 0;                 // temporary holder
00385         short                           result = 0;
00386         bool                            item_opened = false;    // is there currently an item open for writing?
00387         
00388         LIBXML_TEST_VERSION                                                     // init the library
00389 
00390         // 1. Check the file before we try to use it
00391         if(hub_preset_validate(x, path) != 0)
00392                 return;
00393         
00394         // 2. Read and parse the file
00395         reader = xmlReaderForFile(path, NULL, 0);
00396 
00397         if(reader != NULL){
00398                 hub_presets_clear(x);
00399                 ret = xmlTextReaderRead(reader);
00400                 
00401                 presetListIterator pli = presetLL->begin();
00402                 critical_enter(0);
00403 
00404                 while(ret==1){
00405                         element_name = xmlTextReaderConstName(reader);
00406                         if(element_name == NULL)
00407                                 return;
00408                         
00409                         if(!strcmp((char *)element_name, "preset")){
00410                                 if(xmlTextReaderNodeType(reader) == 1){                         // element start
00411                                         number = xmlTextReaderGetAttribute(reader, (xmlChar *)"number");
00412                                         //post("PRESET: %s - %s", (char *)xmlTextReaderGetAttribute(reader, (xmlChar *)"number"), (char *)xmlTextReaderGetAttribute(reader, (xmlChar *)"name"));
00413                                         //sscanf((char *)xmlTextReaderGetAttribute(reader, (xmlChar *)"number"), "%i", &preset_num);
00414                                         sscanf((const char *)number, "%i", &preset_num);
00415 
00416                                         preset = (t_preset *)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_preset));
00417                                         preset->number = preset_num;
00418                                         name = xmlTextReaderGetAttribute(reader, (xmlChar *)"name");
00419                                         //preset->name = gensym((char *)xmlTextReaderGetAttribute(reader, (xmlChar *)"name"));
00420                                         preset->name = gensym((char *)name);
00421                                         preset->item = new presetItemList;      
00422         
00423                                         xmlFree((void *)number);
00424                                         number = NULL;
00425                                         xmlFree((void *)name);
00426                                         name = NULL;
00427                                 }
00428                                 else if(xmlTextReaderNodeType(reader) == 15){           // element close
00429                                         //post("PRESET CLOSING: %s", (char *)xmlTextReaderGetAttribute(reader, (xmlChar *)"number"));
00430                                         presetLL->merge(preset, presetIsLess);
00431                                 }
00432                         }
00433 
00434                         if(!strcmp((char *)element_name, "item")){
00435                                 if(xmlTextReaderNodeType(reader) == 1){                         // element start
00436                                         item_opened = true;
00437                                         //post("   ITEM: %s", (char *)xmlTextReaderGetAttribute(reader, (xmlChar *)"name"));
00438                                         item = (t_preset_item *)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(t_preset_item));
00439                                         name = xmlTextReaderGetAttribute(reader, (xmlChar *)"name");
00440                                         item->param_name = gensym((char *)name);
00441                                         type = xmlTextReaderGetAttribute(reader, (xmlChar *)"type");
00442                                         if(type != NULL)
00443                                                 item->type = gensym((char *)type);
00444                                         else
00445                                                 item->type = ps_msg_generic;
00446                                         priority = xmlTextReaderGetAttribute(reader, (xmlChar *)"priority");
00447                                         if(priority)
00448                                                 sscanf((char *)priority, "%ld", &item->priority);
00449                                         else
00450                                                 item->priority = 0;
00451                                         xmlFree((void *)name);
00452                                         name = NULL;
00453                                         xmlFree((void *)type);
00454                                         type = NULL;
00455                                         /* XXX should we also be calling xmlFree(reader, (xmlChar*)"priority") right here? */
00456                                         xmlFree((void*)priority); 
00457                                         priority = NULL;
00458                                 }
00459                                 else if(xmlTextReaderNodeType(reader) == 15){           // element close
00460                                         preset->item->push_back(item);
00461                                         item_opened = false;
00462                                 }
00463                         }
00464 
00465                         if(xmlTextReaderNodeType(reader) == XML_TEXT_NODE){
00466                                 val = xmlTextReaderConstValue(reader);
00467                                 if((val != NULL) && (item_opened)){
00468                                         float   temp_float = 0;
00469                                         long    temp_int = 0;
00470                 
00471                                         if(item->type == ps_msg_symbol){
00472                                                 //post("Symbol! %s", (char *)value);
00473                                                 atom_setsym(&item->value, gensym((char *)val));         // assume symbol        
00474                                                 item->list_size = 1;
00475                                         }
00476                                         else if((item->type == ps_msg_int) || (item->type == ps_msg_toggle)){
00477                                                 result = sscanf((char *)val, "%ld", &temp_int);         // try to get long
00478                                                 if(result > 0){
00479                                                         //post("Int! %i", temp_int, result);
00480                                                         atom_setlong(&item->value, temp_int);                                   
00481                                                         item->list_size = 1;
00482                                                 }
00483                                         } 
00484                                         else {                                                  // (msg_list, msg_generic, a list or not specified)
00485                                                 char *sep = " ";
00486                                                 char *element;
00487                                                 int i = item->list_size = 0;
00488 
00489                                                 for(element = strtok((char*)val, sep); element; element = strtok(NULL, sep), i++) {
00490                                                         switch(coerceType(element))
00491                                                         {
00492                                                                 case A_LONG:
00493                                                                         if(sscanf(element, "%ld", &temp_int)) {
00494                                                                                 atom_setlong(&item->value_list[i], temp_int);
00495                                                                                 item->list_size += 1;
00496                                                                         }
00497                                                                         break;
00498                                                                 case A_FLOAT:
00499                                                                         if(sscanf(element, "%f", &temp_float)) {
00500                                                                                 atom_setfloat(&item->value_list[i], temp_float);
00501                                                                                 item->list_size += 1;
00502                                                                         }
00503                                                                         break;
00504                                                                 case A_SYM:
00505                                                                         atom_setsym(&item->value_list[i], gensym((char*)element));
00506                                                                         item->list_size += 1;                                                   
00507                                                                         break;
00508                                                                 default:
00509                                                                         error("Unable to determine data type");
00510                                                                         break;
00511                                                         }
00512                                                 }
00513                                         }
00514                                 }
00515                         }                       
00516                         ret = xmlTextReaderRead(reader);
00517                 }
00518                 xmlFreeTextReader(reader);
00519                 if(ret != 0){
00520                         error("%s: failed to parse", path);
00521                 }
00522                 critical_exit(0);
00523         }
00524         else{
00525                 error("Unable to open %s", path);
00526         }
00527 }
00528 
00529 
00530 // Given a path, validate the xml file
00531 short hub_preset_validate(t_hub *x, char *xml_path)
00532 {
00533         char                                    filename[256];                  // for storing the name of the file locally
00534         char                                    fullpath[512];                  // path and name passed on to the xml parser
00535         short                                   path = 0;                               // pathID#
00536         long                                    outtype = 0;                    // the file type that is actually true
00537         xmlDocPtr                               schema_doc = NULL;
00538         xmlSchemaParserCtxtPtr  parser_context = NULL;
00539         xmlSchemaPtr                    schema = NULL;
00540         xmlSchemaValidCtxtPtr   context = NULL;
00541         xmlDocPtr                               document = NULL;
00542         short                                   result = 0;
00543         
00544         // 1. Find the XML Schema file
00545         strcpy(filename, "jamoma.xsd");
00546         if(locatefile_extended(filename, &path, &outtype, NULL, -1)){
00547                 error("jcom.hub (%s module): jamoma.xsd schema file not found", x->attr_name->s_name);
00548                 return -1;
00549         }       
00550         jcom_core_getfilepath(path, filename, fullpath);
00551 
00552         // 2. Actually validate the XML file using the schema...
00553         //schema_doc = xmlReadFile("/Users/tim/Developer/_electrotap/Jamoma/library/jamoma.xsd", NULL, 0);
00554         schema_doc = xmlReadFile(fullpath, NULL, 0);
00555         if(schema_doc == NULL){
00556                 error("jcom.hub: preset validation could not open schema doc");
00557                 goto out;
00558         }
00559 
00560         parser_context = xmlSchemaNewDocParserCtxt(schema_doc);
00561         if(schema_doc == NULL){
00562                 error("jcom.hub: preset validation could not create parser for schema doc");
00563                 goto out;
00564         }
00565 
00566         schema = xmlSchemaParse(parser_context);
00567         if(schema_doc == NULL){
00568                 error("jcom.hub: preset validation could not create representation of schema in memory");
00569                 goto out;
00570         }
00571 
00572         context = xmlSchemaNewValidCtxt(schema);
00573         if(context == NULL){
00574                 error("jcom.hub: preset validation failed to create a context");
00575                 goto out;
00576         }
00577 
00578         document = xmlReadFile(xml_path, NULL, 0);
00579         if(document == NULL){
00580                 error("jcom.hub: preset validation could not open the preset file");
00581                 goto out;
00582         }
00583 
00584         result = xmlSchemaValidateDoc(context, document);       
00585         if(result){
00586                 error("jcom.hub: preset file FAILED xml schema validation");
00587         }
00588 
00589 out:            
00590         xmlFreeDoc(document);
00591         xmlSchemaFreeValidCtxt(context);
00592         xmlSchemaFree(schema);
00593         xmlSchemaFreeParserCtxt(parser_context);
00594         xmlFreeDoc(schema_doc);
00595         
00596         return result;
00597 }
00598 
00599 
00600 // Erase all presets from memory
00601 void hub_presets_clear(t_hub *x)
00602 {
00603         presetList              *presetList = x->preset;
00604         presetItemList  *itemList;
00605         presetItemListIterator  nextItem;
00606         presetListIterator pli;
00607         t_preset *thePreset;    
00608 
00609         critical_enter(0);      
00610         while(!presetList->empty()) {
00611                 pli = presetList->begin();
00612                 thePreset = *pli;
00613                 itemList = thePreset->item;  // The list of items in the preset
00614                 // Delete all the items in the preset
00615                 while(!itemList->empty()) {
00616                         nextItem = itemList->begin();
00617                         sysmem_freeptr(*nextItem);
00618                         itemList->remove(nextItem);
00619                 }
00620                 delete itemList;
00621                 // Free the preset itself
00622                 sysmem_freeptr(thePreset);
00623                 // Remove from list
00624                 presetList->remove(pli);
00625         }
00626         critical_exit(0);
00627 }
00628 
00629 
00630 // dump the preset info to the Max window for debugging
00631 void hub_presets_dump(t_hub *x)
00632 {
00633         presetList              *preset = x->preset;
00634         presetItemList  *item;
00635 
00636         post("");
00637         post("PRESET DUMP");
00638         post("");
00639         
00640         presetListIterator i;
00641         presetItemListIterator itemIterator;
00642         t_preset *p;
00643         t_preset_item *presetItem;
00644         critical_enter(0);
00645         for(i = preset->begin(); i != preset->end(); ++i) {
00646                 p = *i;
00647                 post("  PRESET %i: %s", p->number, p->name->s_name);
00648                 item = p->item;
00649                 for(itemIterator = item->begin(); itemIterator != item->end(); ++itemIterator) {
00650                         presetItem = *itemIterator;
00651                         if((presetItem->type == ps_msg_int) || (presetItem->type == ps_msg_toggle))
00652                                 post("    %s (type %s, priority %i): %ld", presetItem->param_name->s_name,
00653                                         presetItem->type->s_name, presetItem->priority, atom_getlong(&(presetItem->value)));
00654                         else if(presetItem->type == ps_msg_symbol)
00655                                 post("    %s (type %s, priority %i): %s", presetItem->param_name->s_name,
00656                                         presetItem->type->s_name, presetItem->priority, 
00657                                         atom_getsym(&(presetItem->value))->s_name);
00658                         else
00659                                 post("    %s (type %s, priority %i): %f", presetItem->param_name->s_name, 
00660                                         presetItem->type->s_name, presetItem->priority, atom_getfloat(&(presetItem->value)));
00661                 }               
00662         }
00663         critical_exit(0);
00664 }
00665 
00666 
00667 void hub_preset_write(t_hub *x, t_symbol *userpath)
00668 {
00669 
00670         if(x->preset->empty()){ // no presets have been stored, so store the current state as the default
00671                 t_atom  a[2];
00672 
00673                 atom_setlong(&a[0], 1);
00674                 atom_setsym(&a[1], ps_default);
00675                 hub_preset_store(x, gensym("/preset/store"), 2, a);
00676         } else {
00677                 // recall the number of the preset we recalled last in the first preset (the one being recalled now)
00678                 long num = (*(x->preset->begin()))->last_preset_num;
00679                 // recall the name as well
00680                 t_symbol *name = (*(x->preset->begin()))->last_preset_name;
00681                 t_atom b[2];
00682                 atom_setlong(&b[0], num);
00683                 atom_setsym(&b[1], name);
00684                 hub_preset_store(x, gensym("/preset/store"), 2, b);
00685         }
00686         
00687         defer_low(x, (method)hub_preset_dowrite, userpath, 0, 0L);
00688 }
00689 
00690 void writeList(t_filehandle *fh, long *eof, t_preset_item *item)
00691 {
00692         char tempstring[512];
00693         long len, err;
00694         t_symbol* sym;
00695         len = err = 0;
00696         
00697         // write name and type
00698         snprintf(tempstring, sizeof(tempstring), "    <item name='%s' type='%s' priority='%ld'>",
00699                 item->param_name->s_name, item->type->s_name, item->priority);
00700         len = strlen(tempstring);
00701         sysfile_write(*fh, &len, tempstring);
00702         *eof += len;
00703         
00704         for(int i = 0; i < item->list_size; i++) {
00705                 switch(item->value_list[i].a_type) 
00706                 {
00707                         case A_SYM:
00708                                 sym = atom_getsym(&item->value_list[i]);
00709                                 snprintf(tempstring, sizeof(tempstring), "%s ", sym->s_name);
00710                                 break;
00711                         case A_FLOAT:
00712                                 snprintf(tempstring, sizeof(tempstring), "%f ", atom_getfloat(&item->value_list[i]));
00713                                 break;
00714                         case A_LONG:
00715                                 snprintf(tempstring, sizeof(tempstring), "%ld ", atom_getlong(&item->value_list[i]));
00716                                 break;
00717                 }
00718                 len = strlen(tempstring);
00719                 sysfile_write(*fh, &len, tempstring);
00720                 *eof += len;
00721                 
00722         }
00723         strncpy(tempstring, "</item>\n", sizeof(tempstring) - 1);
00724         len = strlen(tempstring);
00725         sysfile_write(*fh, &len, tempstring);
00726         *eof += len;
00727 }
00728 
00729 void hub_preset_dowrite(t_hub *x, t_symbol *userpath)
00730 {
00731         long                    type = 'TEXT';                          // four-char code for Mac file type
00732         char                    filename[256];                          // for storing the name of the file locally
00733         short                   path, err;                                      // pathID#, error number
00734         long                    outtype;                                        // the file type that is actually true
00735         t_filehandle    file_handle;                            // a reference to our file (for opening it, closing it, etc.)
00736         long                    myEof = 0;
00737         char                    tempstring[1024];
00738         presetList              *preset = x->preset;            // the head of the linked list
00739         presetItemList  *item = NULL;                           // for accessing items of the preset
00740         t_symbol                *result;
00741 
00742         // SPECIFY THE FILE WE WANT TO WRITE
00743         if(!userpath->s_name[0]){                                                                                               // Empty string - Throw up a dialog
00744                 sprintf(filename, "%s.xml", x->attr_name->s_name);                                      // Default File Name
00745                 saveas_promptset("Save Preset...");                                                                     // Instructional Text in the dialog
00746                 err = saveasdialog_extended(filename, &path, &outtype, &type, 1);       // Returns 0 if successful
00747                 if(err)                                                                                                                         // User Cancelled
00748                         return;                                                                                                                 
00749         }
00750         else{
00751                 strcpy(filename, userpath->s_name);                                                                     // Copy symbol argument to a local string
00752                 path = 0;               
00753         }
00754 
00755         // NOW ATTEMPT TO CREATE THE FILE...
00756         err = path_createsysfile(filename, path, type, &file_handle);
00757         if(err){                                                                                                                                // Handle any errors that occur
00758                 error("jcom.hub: %s - error %d creating file", filename, err);
00759                 return; 
00760         }
00761 
00762         // HERE WE CAN FINALLY WRITE THE DATA OUT TO THE FILE
00763         jcom_core_file_writeline(&file_handle, &myEof, "<?xml version='1.0' encoding='iso-8859-1' standalone='yes' ?>");
00764         jcom_core_file_writeline(&file_handle, &myEof, "");
00765         jcom_core_file_writeline(&file_handle, &myEof, "<jamoma version='0.4'");
00766         jcom_core_file_writeline(&file_handle, &myEof, "                xmlns:xsi='http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance'");
00767         jcom_core_file_writeline(&file_handle, &myEof, "                xsi:schemaLocation='http://jamoma.org/ file:jamoma.xsd'");
00768         jcom_core_file_writeline(&file_handle, &myEof, ">");
00769 
00770         // Process each preset
00771         presetListIterator i;
00772         presetItemListIterator itemIterator;
00773         t_preset* p;
00774         t_preset_item *presetItem;
00775         preset = x->preset;     // head of the list of presets
00776         critical_enter(0);
00777         for(i = preset->begin(); i != preset->end(); ++i) {
00778                 p = *i;
00779                 sprintf(tempstring, "  <preset number='%ld' name='%s'>", p->number, p->name->s_name);
00780                 jcom_core_file_writeline(&file_handle, &myEof, tempstring);
00781 
00782                 // Process each item in the preset
00783                 item = p->item;
00784                 for(itemIterator = item->begin(); itemIterator != item->end(); ++itemIterator) {
00785                         presetItem = *itemIterator;
00786                         if(presetItem->list_size > 1) {
00787                                 writeList(&file_handle, &myEof, presetItem);                            
00788                         } else {
00789                                 if(presetItem->value.a_type == A_SYM){
00790                                         result = atom_getsym(&(presetItem->value));
00791                                         sprintf(tempstring, "    <item name='%s' type='%s' priority='%ld'>%s</item>",
00792                                                 presetItem->param_name->s_name, presetItem->type->s_name, 
00793                                                 presetItem->priority, result->s_name);
00794                                 }
00795                                 else if(presetItem->value.a_type == A_FLOAT)
00796                                         sprintf(tempstring, "    <item name='%s' type='%s' priority='%ld'>%f</item>",
00797                                                 presetItem->param_name->s_name, presetItem->type->s_name, presetItem->priority,
00798                                                 atom_getfloat(&(presetItem->value)));
00799                                 else if(presetItem->value.a_type == A_LONG)
00800                                         sprintf(tempstring, "    <item name='%s' type='%s' priority='%ld'>%ld</item>",
00801                                                 presetItem->param_name->s_name, presetItem->type->s_name, presetItem->priority,
00802                                                 atom_getlong(&(presetItem->value)));
00803                                 
00804                                 jcom_core_file_writeline(&file_handle, &myEof, tempstring);
00805                         }
00806                 }
00807                 
00808                 jcom_core_file_writeline(&file_handle, &myEof, "  </preset>");
00809         }
00810         jcom_core_file_writeline(&file_handle, &myEof, "</jamoma>");
00811         critical_exit(0);
00812         
00813         // WE ARE DONE, SO CLOSE THE FILE
00814         err = sysfile_seteof(file_handle, myEof);
00815         if(err){
00816                 error("jcom.hub: %s - error %d creating EOF", filename, err);
00817                 return; 
00818         }
00819                                                         
00820         sysfile_close(file_handle);             // close file reference
00821         post("Jamoma: /preset/write completed successfully");
00822 }
00823 
00824 
00825 // Communicate with the gui to build the preset listing in the module menu
00826 void hub_preset_buildmenu(t_hub *x)
00827 {
00828         presetList              *preset = x->preset;
00829         t_atom                  a[3];
00830 
00831         if(x->gui_object != NULL){
00832                 atom_setsym(&a[0], ps_NEW_PRESETS_START);
00833                 object_method_typed(x->gui_object, ps_dispatched, 1, a, NULL);
00834                 
00835                 presetListIterator i;
00836                 t_preset *p;
00837                 for(i = preset->begin(); i != preset->end(); ++i) {
00838                         p = *i;
00839                         atom_setsym(&a[0], ps_NEW_PRESETS);
00840                         atom_setsym(&a[1], p->name);
00841                         object_method_typed(x->gui_object, ps_dispatched, 2, a, NULL);
00842                 }
00843 
00844                 atom_setsym(&a[0], ps_MENU_REBUILD);            
00845                 object_method_typed(x->gui_object, ps_dispatched, 1, a, NULL);
00846         }
00847 }
